content:
When I'm not in the mood for social interactions,
Even if friends come knocking at my door,
I simply remain silent in my dwelling, feigning absence~
info: 幻雪手工图桌相关闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I don't want to worry my friends, I just...
ran out of social energy.
I'd like to lay quietly on the couch and contemplate the secrets of the night sky.
info: 幻雪手工图桌相关闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I polish all the telescope lenses myself,
Even though there are various blueprints available,
And ready-made products for purchase,

content:
Seeing Mobai introduce the DIY Bench,
I wonder what you'll craft~?
Tools? Furniture? Or perhaps...

content:
But for those who dedicate themselves to a specific field,
crafting professional tools with their own hands
is also a form of devotion.

content:

on such a tiny workbench, could you?!
